revised_title: Slip Waves in Anisotropic Elastic Half-Spaces: A Study of Interface Phenomena
tldr: This article investigates slip waves along the interface between two anisotropic elastic half-spaces in sliding contact. It explores the conditions for the existence of slip waves and introduces the possibility of a new slip-wave mode called the second slip-wave mode due to elastic anisotropy. The study emphasizes the need for a more detailed understanding of the behavior of anisotropic materials in surface-wave theory.
